resources.string: Please press Start to begin downloading necessary files. This is quite a big download, so you may want to connect to Wifi first.
Press start to download the upgrade. This is a very small download and should only take a few seconds.
The latest version is already installed. Are you sure you wish to redownload?
Run spoof on everything on the network. May slow down the phone a lot and cause the battery to melt.
Enter an IP address of someone to spoof not seen in this list.
Please enter a custom IP address / hostname of victim to attack.
Something went wrong whilst trying to load. Perhaps the SD card isn\'t plugged in, or you didn\'t accept the superuser command?\n\nCheck the log for more details.

Please root your phone before using this application. Search the internet for instructions on how to do this for your phone. A custom firmware (such as CyanogenMod) is also recommended. If the \'su\' application is somewhere else on your phone, please specify it in the settings.
This device is capable of root access, but root access is not enabled. Please enable root access to use Network Spoofer.
Download the setup files uncompressed (larger download). Use if you are having problems with the extraction process.
Set a custom path to the superuser binary. Normally this is automatically detected.
Set a custom path to the busybox binary. Normally this is automatically detected.
Automatically choose the default detected router, allowing you to skip one of the steps.
Automatically chooses to run attack for everyone on the network.
The number of simultaneous threads for scanning the local network - can make the process faster
Welcome to the device report generator. This will generate a file you can send to the developers to help them debug Network Spoofer on your device.
Network Spoofer lets you change websites on other peopleâ€™s computers from an Android phone.

DISCLAIMER: This application is not to be used for any purposes other than to demonstrate its functions, and must only be used on networks for which you have permission to do so. Any other use is not the responsibility of the developer.\nIn other words, don\'t be stupid, and don\'t direct angry people towards me.

This program is free software: you can redistribute it and/or modify it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by the Free Software Foundation, either version 3 of the License, or (at your option) any later version. \nThis program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the GNU General Public License for more details. \nYou should have received a copy of the GNU General Public License along with this program. If not, see <http://www.gnu.org/licenses/>.
Rather than download from SourceForge (recommended), use this URL to download the environment.
The loop device on which to mount the debian image. If the user has a lot of apps installed on the SD card, this may need changing.
The loop device number with which to create the loop device. If the user has a lot of apps installed on the SD card, this may need changing (higher is better).
A location on the phone\'s file system to mount the required image.
Path to the debian image. Note that setting this to a non-blank value will require you to download the images manually.
The Linux interface name of the adapter through which you will be running these spoofs.
Many thanks to the developer of the \'upside-down-ternet\' (see above link) and the writer of \'playing with traffic\' (also above) for the inspiration for this project.
Use the version of Busybox distributed with Network Spoofer. Uncheck to use the phone\'s version.
Enter custom text values to change. Blank fields are ignored.
Please enter a website to redirect to, eg. kittenwar.com.
Remember, only run Network Spoofer when you have permission to do so. Don\'t run at work, university, school etc. without the permission of your network administrators.
Opt out of collection of usage statistics
Network Spoofer is maintained in the my spare time, for free. I understand that people hate adverts (as do I) so please consider donating if you like this app!
Please email this report to nsreport@digitalsquid.co.uk. It\'s best to also file a bug report and reference the following code in your report:
Great! Now just file a bug report on Github, referencing the following code.
Be sure to check if your issue is already described in an existing bug. If so, comment with the code and mention that it also affects you.
